issue.title: FCD Ballot Comment GB-50
issue.discussion: This definition of move-assignment operator redundant and confusing now that the term move-assignment operator is defined by the core language in subclause 12.8p21.
issue.resolution: Strike suclause 17.3.13 [defns.move.assign.op]. Add a cross-reference to (12.8) to 17.3.12.
